remarks: Membership in a restricted class abstraction, using implicit substitution.  (Closed theorem version of ~ elrab3 .)  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Aug-2017.)
statement:
elrab3t $p |- ( ( A. x ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) /\ A e. B ) -> ( A e. { x e. B | ph } <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ps x $.
